title: Are you serious
body: WHY CANT YOU JUST PROVIDE A DECANT SERVICE FOR ONE GAME! LIKE ONE GAME! I WAS IN MY FINAL PROMO GAME AND BAM, 2000 PING. WHY IS IT THAT YOU CANNOT MANAGE TO MAKE THE GAME PLAYABLE IN THE ONE GAME THAT COUNTS.

replies.body: It's clearly your internet, not Riots servers.
having the same problem, ping is fine for everything else just league thats pinging out and i am also in my last promo game gonna lose because of 500 ping since load in.
